mapper.select: SELECT COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE, MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, POST_COMMENT.POST_DATE, POST_COMMENT.COMMENT_CONTENT FROM COMMUNITY_POST inner join MEMBER on COMMUNITY_POST.MEMBER_ID = MEMBER.MEMBER_ID inner join POST_COMMENT on POST_COMMENT.POST_NUMBER = COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER order by COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER DESC

SELECT MEMBER.MEMBER_NAME, POST_COMMENT.COMMENT_CONTENT, POST_COMMENT.POST_DATE FROM MEMBER INNER JOIN POST_COMMENT ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = POST_COMMENT.MEMBER_ID where POST_COMMENT.POST_NUMBER = #{parameter}
select * from community_post WHERE COMMUNITY_NUMBER = 'C02' order by POST_NUMBER desc

SELECT COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT FROM COMMUNITY_POST inner join MEMBER where COMMUNITY_NUMBER = 'C03' group by COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT order by POST_NUMBER DESC

SELECT LECTURE.LECTURE_NUMBER, LECTURE.LECTURE_TITLE, LECTURE.LECTURE_INTRO, LECTURE.LECTURE_IMAGE, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID FROM ENROLLMENT inner join LECTURE ON LECTURE.LECTURE_NUMBER = ENROLLMENT.LECTURE_NUMBER inner join MEMBER ON MEMBER.MEMBER_ID = ENROLLMENT.MEMBER_ID
where ENROLLMENT.MEMBER_ID = 'circle01'
select * from COMMUNITY_POST WHERE COMMUNITY_NUMBER = 'C04' order by POST_NUMBER desc
mapper.insert: insert into COMMUNITY_POST (POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_CONTENT, COMMUNITY_TITLE, FILE_ATTACHIMENT, COMMUNITY_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_NUMBER) value (NEXTVAL('post'),#{community_content},#{community_title},#{file_Attachiment},now(),'0','circle01',#{community_number})
insert into POST_COMMENT (COMMENT_NUMBER, POST_NUMBER, COMMENT_CONTENT, POST_DATE, MEMBER_ID) value (NEXTVAL2('comm'),#{POST_NUMBER},#{COMMENT_CONTENT},now(),'circle01')
